school_story_19_screen_13_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Vad tror du händer om du inte betalar din skuld nu då?
school_story_19_screen_13_button_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE De skickar en till påminnelse
school_story_19_screen_13_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE De glömmer bort min skuld
school_story_19_screen_14_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Då skickar de en påminnelse till.
school_story_19_screen_14_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Sometimes they also cost a fee, but usually not.
school_story_19_screen_15_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Men nu har företaget skickat två påminnelser och du har fortfarande inte betalat.
school_story_19_screen_15_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE The company you owe, can now turn to another company for help in getting you to pay your debt.
school_story_19_screen_16_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Dom skickar nu din skuld till inkasso som man brukar kalla sådana företag som förkortning.
school_story_19_screen_16_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Inkassoföretag hjälper företag med att skicka påminnelser om skulder.
school_story_19_screen_16_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Det har jag hört talas om
school_story_19_screen_17_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Och nu blir det genast dyrare! En påminnelseavgift från ett inkassoföretag kostar 180kr.
school_story_19_screen_17_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Din skuld är redan uppe i 260kr. 200kr för spelet och 60kr i påminnelseavgift från företaget. Hur mycket blir det nu?
school_story_19_screen_18_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Din skuld har alltså ökat från 200kr till 440kr. Bara för att du inte betalar.
school_story_19_screen_18_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Det är mer än dubbelt ju!
school_story_19_screen_18_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Så här kan det inte fortsätta...
school_story_19_screen_19_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Det är inte alls bra, om man inte betalar blir det dyrt! Och om du fortfarande inte betalar så kommer skulden gå vidare till Kronofogden.
school_story_19_screen_19_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Det kan ge konsekvenser i längden, men det tar vi efter utmaningen, mina morötter kokar över!
school_story_19_screen_19_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Trodde du var gris, inte kanin...
school_story_20_screen_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Vi fortsätter nu direkt med vad som händer om man inte betalar sina räkningar.
school_story_20_screen_1_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Förra berättelsen avslutade vi med att man blev skickad till inkassor företaget. Minns du?
school_story_20_screen_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE I vårt exempel så hade företaget du var skyldig pengar skickat två påminnelser, och sedan skickat det till ett inkassoföretag.
school_story_20_screen_2_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Din skuld ökade från 200kr för köpet, till 440kr när det lades på påminnelseavgifter och inkassokrav.
school_story_20_screen_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Men vad tror du händer om du fortsatt inte betalar skulden?
school_story_20_screen_3_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Inget bra i alla fall!
school_story_20_screen_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Det kan komma ännu fler avgifter från inkassoföretaget, eller så kan de välja att koppla in kronofogden.
school_story_20_screen_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Kronofogden är en statlig myndighet och har två uppgifter. Den första är att hjälpa dem som behöver få in en skuld av någon som inte betalar.
school_story_20_screen_5_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Den andra är att ge stöd och råd åt dem som behöver betala en skuld de har.
school_story_20_screen_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE När kronofogden har tagit över ett ärende som det heter, så får man ett betalningskrav. Och detta får du också betala för.
school_story_20_screen_6_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Har det gått såhär långt, är du nu skyldig företaget 440kr, och dessutom 680kr till kronofogden. Hur mycket blir det?
school_story_20_screen_8_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Svaret är 1120kr. Betalar man allt nu, både skulden till företaget och vad man är skyldig kronofogden, så händer inget mer.
school_story_20_screen_8_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Men tänk på att du har blivit skyldig nästan 6 gånger vad köpet på 200kr kostade, för att du inte betalat innan.
school_story_20_screen_9_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Tänk om man fått något av dessa krav eller inkassobrev utan att man är skyldig pengar? Då måste man säga till att det inte stämmer. Det kallas att bestida.
school_story_20_screen_9_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Det är viktigt att veta att man inte bara kan strunta i breven från inkasso och kronofogden, utan man måste bestrida det i tid.
school_story_20_screen_9_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Okej, ska försöka komma ihåg
school_story_20_screen_10_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Men om Kronofogden har tagit ett beslut, och bestämt att du måste betala men du fortfarande inte gör det...
school_story_20_screen_10_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE ... så kommer ett steg till. Något som kan ge större konsekvenser för dig under lång tid.
school_story_20_screen_11_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Kronofogden har ju informationen om att man har en skuld hos dem och att den inte blir betald.
school_story_20_screen_11_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Den informationen delas med något som heter kreditupplysningsföretag. Dessa företag samlar information om alla och om de sköter sina betalningar.
school_story_20_screen_12_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE När kreditupplysningsföretaget har informationen om en obetalda skuld hos kronofogden, så får man en betalningsanmärkning.
school_story_20_screen_12_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Det är inte alls bra att få en betalningsanmärkning. Den ligger kvar i 3 år och gör att det blir mycket svårare för dig att betala via faktura, skaffa mobilabonnemang eller hyra lägenhet.
school_story_20_screen_12_button_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Allt detta för så lite som 200kr?
school_story_20_screen_13_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Det är allvarligt att inte betala sina skulder. Som jag sa kan det ge dig stora kostnader och långsiktiga följder.
school_story_20_screen_13_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Om du har större skulder, har kronofogden också rätt att komma hem till dig och sälja dina saker för att betala dina skulder.
school_story_20_screen_13_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Va, hur kan dom få det?
school_story_20_screen_13_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Ja det är ju inte ditt om du inte betalat
school_story_20_screen_14_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Ja det är ju så, har man inte betalat så äger man det inte. Men vi sammanfattar: Ifall du inte betalar i tid, så kan en skuld på 200kr öka till 1120kr.
school_story_20_screen_14_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Och det kan få följder i flera år, som en betalningsanmärkning. Så betala i tid, det lönar sig!
school_story_20_screen_14_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Ja. Låter bara dumt att låta bli
school_story_20_screen_14_button_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Bara handla om jag har råd!
school_story_21_screen_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Jag har velat fråga dig en sak!
school_story_21_screen_1_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Finns det något dyrt som du gärna skulle vilja köpa men som du inte har råd med?
school_story_21_screen_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Ja jag har också drömmar om dyra grejer. Skulle vilja köpa en liten måne som ligger i orbit runt planet 578, att bygga semesterstuga på.
school_story_21_screen_2_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Men det är en stor utgift, och jag kommer få spara ett tag innan jag kan få råd, men jag tänkte låna en del av kostnaden.
school_story_21_screen_2_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Låter som en bra dröm!
school_story_21_screen_2_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE En måne? Jag vill också!
school_story_21_screen_2_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Inget är bättre än skärgården!
school_story_21_screen_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Det är ju egentligen sant att det är bättre att spara ihop än att låna, men vissa gånger så måste man ta en annan lösning.
school_story_21_screen_3_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Och lån för bostad t.ex. tar de flesta någon gång i livet, för det är väldigt få som har så mycket pengar att de kan spara ihop alla pengarna som en bostad kostar.
school_story_21_screen_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Om till exempel kylskåpet går sönder och man inte har en buffert ihopsparad, så har man inte råd, men utan kylskåp är det väldigt svårt att klara sig.
school_story_21_screen_4_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE När man inte har pengar så att man kan betala köpet direkt, finns det många företag som tillåter att man köper det på avbetalning.
school_story_21_screen_4_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Jag tror jag vet vad det är
school_story_21_screen_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Att handla på avbetalning innebär att du inte betalar hela beloppet på samma gång. Istället delar företaget upp det i flera mindre betalningar under en viss tidsperiod.
school_story_21_screen_5_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Det är ofta lättare att betala en mindre summa varje månad när man fått lön, för man behöver ju ha kvar pengar från lönen till vanliga kostnader också.
school_story_21_screen_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Vi provar räkna. Om man ville handla något för 10 000kr på avbetalning, och haft 10 månader på sig att betala,
school_story_21_screen_6_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Hur mycket hade man fått betala i månaden?
school_story_21_screen_7_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Men vid avbetalning så tillkommer ofta ränta och andra avgifter vilket gör att det blir dyrare än att betala direkt.
school_story_21_screen_7_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Så man kan ju försöka ha den där sparbufferten att betala ifrån om något händer.
school_story_21_screen_7_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Sparbuffert vet jag är bra
school_story_21_screen_8_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Hursomhelst, för att få lov att köpa på avbetalning, eller ta ett lån på banken, vill företaget gärna se om dom tror du kommer betala det du blir skyldig.
school_story_21_screen_8_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Både lån och avbetalning betalar man ju efter att man fått det man köpte, i efterhand, och tror de att du inte kommer betala så vill inte företag eller banker gå med på det.
school_story_21_screen_10_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Det kan ju vara klurigt att veta om någon kommer betala eller inte, men det finns ett sätt för företag och banker att ta reda på information om dina tidigare betalningar.
school_story_21_screen_10_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Dom kan göra en kreditupplysning på dig via ett kreditupplysningsföretag. Det finns ca 10 kreditupplysningsföretag i Sverige, ett av dem är UC.
school_story_21_screen_10_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE UC har jag hört talas om!
school_story_21_screen_11_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Kreditupplysningen innehåller information om din ekonomi, nästan lite som din personliga ekonomihistoria.
school_story_21_screen_11_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Det står till exempel hur mycket du tjänar om du har ett jobb. Om du redan har några lån, finns de med där och det är här betalningsanmärkningar kommer in.
school_story_21_screen_12_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Ja det är här betalningsanmärkningarna hamnar, på kreditupplysningen från företag som UC, som sysslar med detta.
school_story_21_screen_12_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Har man haft skulder man inte betalat är det ju viktig information för andra företag att veta, och det är därför en betalningsanmärkning kan påverka om man får, till exempel, ett banklån.
school_story_21_screen_12_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Ah, nu är det klart och tydligt
school_story_21_screen_13_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE För att företagen på ett enkelt sätt ska förstå ifall du kommer kunna betala eller inte, så beräknar man en siffra för din ekonomi.
school_story_21_screen_13_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Siffran ligger mellan 0 och 100, eftersom den är i procent.
school_story_21_screen_13_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE En siffra är enkelt att förstå!
school_story_21_screen_14_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Den beräknade procenten för din ekonomi kallas riskprognos.
school_story_21_screen_14_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Riskprognosen beskriver hur stor risken är att du inte betalar en skuld och får en betalningsanmärkning inom 1 år.
school_story_21_screen_15_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Om man har en låg riskprognos, alltså en låg siffra, betyder det att du sköter dina betalningar och att företag och banker inte behöver vara rädda för att du inte ska betala dem.
school_story_21_screen_15_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Men, om du har en hög siffra i riskprognosen, kommer de inte lita på att du kommer betala det du är skyldig.
school_story_21_screen_15_button_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Fattar, de vill inte riskera
school_story_21_screen_15_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Lita på mig! Jag pröjsar!
school_story_21_screen_16_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE En hög siffra innebär att du till exempel redan har mycket lån eller betalningsanmärkningar sedan tidigare. Men det kan också vara att du har för låg inkomst.
school_story_21_screen_16_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Det vill säga du inte har något jobb eller ett jobb där du tjänar lite pengar, och därför antagligen inte ha råd att betala av lånet eller skulden.
school_story_21_screen_16_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Det vill jag aldrig ha!
school_story_21_screen_17_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Vad som är väldigt bra med kreditupplysningen är att den hjälper företag att ta reda på viktig information om kundernas ekonomi om de kan klara av att betala en ny skuld eller ett nytt lån.
school_story_21_screen_17_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Detta gör alltså att människor inte får låna mer än vad de har råd med, vilket är jättebra för då hamnar de inte i större skulder och problem!
school_story_22_screen_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Welcome back to Fido and me on the planet where you will learn more about saving.
school_story_22_screen_1_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE We will build on what you have learned, and talk a bit about investments too!
school_story_22_screen_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE On Planet 5, I went through the basics of saving and why it is important.
school_story_22_screen_2_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE And as you know, there are many ways to save!
school_story_22_screen_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE We are going to talk more about saving money at the bank.
school_story_22_screen_3_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE There are many different options to choose from, and that is why it is good to know about them so you can choose how you want to save.
school_story_22_screen_3_button_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE I'm saving at the bank!
school_story_22_screen_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you save at the bank, the account you have is called a savings account. This is where you place your money.
school_story_22_screen_4_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Banks want you to save money through them, do you know why?
school_story_22_screen_4_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Because they can use the money!
school_story_22_screen_4_button_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Do they want to swim in them like Scrooge McDuck?
school_story_22_screen_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you remember from the previous planet about saving, they are borrowing your money!
school_story_22_screen_5_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE They can use your money, and in return you get paid. Do you remember what it's called?
school_story_22_screen_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Yes, it’s interest I'm talking about. Sometimes it's specifically called YYsavings rate.YY(vet inte om denna översättning är helt 100) The interest is paid out once a year.
school_story_22_screen_6_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE The savings rate is generally quite low, often between 0 and 0.5%.
school_story_22_screen_7_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE It can be difficult to understand in percent only, so I have an example.
school_story_22_screen_7_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you have saved 1000 SEK at the bank for a year and the saving rate is 0.5%, then you get 5 SEK in interest.
school_story_22_screen_8_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE You may not think that 5 SEK is that much money.
school_story_22_screen_8_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Then it could be good to know that there are ways to get higher interest rates!
school_story_22_screen_9_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you can promise the bank that they can borrow your money over a longer period of time, they will give you more interest.
school_story_22_screen_9_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE I also mentioned this on planet 5, but if you don't remember, you can lock your money, so you promise the bank they can keep them longer before you want to be able to use them again.
school_story_22_screen_9_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Now that you mention it…
school_story_22_screen_11_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE So if you lock your money for 3 years, for example, you can get up to 1% interest!
school_story_22_screen_11_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you save 1000 SEK and lock them for 3 years for 1% interest, you will receive 10 SEK in interest every year instead.
school_story_22_screen_12_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Yes it doesn’t sound like much, but the more you save and the longer you save the more you get paid out of the interest!
school_story_22_screen_12_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE On this planet I'll tell you more about how to earn even more from saving, but first I want tell you something else.
school_story_22_screen_13_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Believe it or not, but it has actually happened that a bank runs out of money!
school_story_22_screen_13_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Then they have borrowed more than they can pay. Banks actually also borrow money from each other. So it is not just us ordinary people who can end up in debt!
school_story_22_screen_14_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE ’But what happens then?’ You are probably thinking? What happens to all the money you have struggled to save?
school_story_22_screen_14_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE To protect your money, there is something called a deposit protection.
school_story_22_screen_15_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Deposit protection. That’s a long word!
school_story_22_screen_15_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Think of a deposit, that is, money that you put into the account, and protection. Protection means they are kept safe. So it is a promise that you will get back the money you deposited into the account.
school_story_22_screen_16_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE It is the Swedish state that promises to give you the money back.
school_story_22_screen_16_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE But there is a limit to how much money you can be sure of getting back from the bank. Do you know how much it is?
school_story_22_screen_17_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE The correct answer is 1 million!!!
school_story_22_screen_17_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE That means you can save risk-free up to at least 1 million without losing them, so just start saving!
school_story_22_screen_18_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE I used the word risk-free, do you know what risk is?
school_story_22_screen_19_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Okay, risk is actually a pretty advanced concept that you have to understand if you want to save and invest in ways where you can earn more.
school_story_22_screen_19_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE So we’ll take that on a destination of it’s own!
school_story_22_screen_19_button_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Want to make more money!
school_story_23_screen_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE I promised I would teach you more about investing, it's a way to use your money. It's often called a kind of saving
school_story_23_screen_1_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Wait, both saving and using at the same time?
school_story_23_screen_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Yes it is actually both. Have you ever heard someone talk about ’saving in shares’?
school_story_23_screen_2_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Yes I think I have
school_story_23_screen_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE You use both the words save and invest, because you take your money and put it away in shares. But you also use it because you buy shares for them with the hope that the money will grow.
school_story_23_screen_3_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE But what does investing mean?
school_story_23_screen_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Invest is a word that means putting money into something with the hope that it will yield a profit, or return as it is called.
school_story_23_screen_4_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE There is a risk, and the more you can win, the greater the risk. But we’ll take that on the last destination.
school_story_23_screen_4_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Tell me more about investing now!
school_story_23_screen_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Okay, let’s do it! Have you thought about what a company is?
school_story_23_screen_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE A company is a business that provides products or services for sale.
school_story_23_screen_6_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE You've probably heard of Disney, IKEA, Coca Cola or Spotify? All of them are companies.
school_story_23_screen_7_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE And you already know what products and services are.
school_story_23_screen_7_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE There are a lot of companies in Sweden, about 300.000!
school_story_23_screen_8_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE You can think of companies as fruit trees in a garden. And there are different kinds of fruit trees, and there are lots of different kinds of companies as well.
school_story_23_screen_10_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE A start-up companyYY(vet inte om vi vill kalla det start-up eller bara kalla det newly started) is like a newly planted tree. And a newly planted tree is more sensitive than a full-grown tree. It needs a lot of water and nutrition.
school_story_23_screen_10_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE The same is true of start-ups, they need nutrition and water in the form of money and dedicated and skilled employees to survive.
school_story_23_screen_10_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Where are you going with this Piggy?
school_story_23_screen_11_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE You will see how it is all connected!
school_story_23_screen_11_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE If a company gets its nutrition and water steady and does not experience a storm, it will grow and become more stable. Once a company has grown large enough, they can start selling parts of itself to you.
school_story_23_screen_12_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Then you can buy shares! Shares are a small part of the company that you buy. And if it goes well for the company and it grows, so does the value of the shares.
school_story_23_screen_12_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE That's why it's an investment, you buy shares in a company for a price, and hope it grows so you can sell them later for a higher price!
school_story_23_screen_12_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE I want to try it
school_story_23_screen_12_button_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE I want to learn about risk first!
school_story_23_screen_13_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE When you own these shares, that is part of the company, you also have the right to receive a part of what the company has earned during the year, it is called a dividend.
school_story_23_screen_13_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE You have to keep in mind that if things go badly for the company instead, then the shares will decrease in value and you will lose money when you sell your shares.
school_story_23_screen_13_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE No! I want a dividend!
school_story_23_screen_13_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Sounds no good at all.
school_story_23_screen_13_button_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE You have to water more!
school_story_23_screen_13_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE You have to keep your fingers crossed
school_story_23_screen_14_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Let’s go back to our example of trees. If you buy a tree when it's just a newly planted twig, but sell it when it's grown into a big apple tree, you get more money when you sell it.
school_story_23_screen_14_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE And the dividend I talked about is like the fruit on the tree! You can get more or less fruit in a year depending on the weather.
school_story_23_screen_14_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE I still can’t see how it's connected
school_story_23_screen_15_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you want to buy shares, it's good to know a lot about the company.
school_story_23_screen_15_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Because you do not know how it’s gonna go for neither companies nor trees in the future, you guess and take a risk.
school_story_23_screen_15_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Knowing a lot is good
school_story_23_screen_16_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Investing in a company is like buying a newly planted tree for a small price. Then hopefully it grows bigger and starts to bear fruit. And then you can sell when it's a big tree!
school_story_23_screen_16_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE You get money from the fruit every year, depending on the weather, and make money selling it more expensive! But there is a risk that it will wither or die and then you will lose the money.
school_story_23_screen_16_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE I like fruit. And money!
school_story_23_screen_16_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE You can buy the right tree!
school_story_23_screen_17_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE I think that is enough new knowledge for the moment. See you soon!
school_story_23_screen_17_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE I’ll just eat some fruit first
school_story_24_screen_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Well then let’s go, so what is risk?
school_story_24_screen_1_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Falling down from a tree
school_story_24_screen_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE All those options are about risky stuff. But what about just risk? It's actually a word that even adults can have a hard time defining.
school_story_24_screen_2_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE But I think the best description is that it is the probability, or the chance, that something undesirable or negative will happen.
school_story_24_screen_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Often the words risk and chance are seen as opposites, so chance is when you talk about positive things and risk is when you talk about negative things.
school_story_24_screen_4_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Imagine you are lending money to someone. Have you ever lent money?
school_story_24_screen_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you have done so, you will of course expect to get your money back in a week or two.
school_story_24_screen_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE But there is a risk that you will not get your money back. How big that risk is depends on who you lend to.
school_story_24_screen_6_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE The more you know about the person, the easier it is to decide if you want to lend money or not.
school_story_24_screen_6_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE I didn’t get mine back!
school_story_24_screen_7_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE If there is someone you trust and who has money, the risk is low. Then it feels OK to lend money.
school_story_24_screen_7_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE If there is someone you do not know and who has no money, the risk is high that you will not get your money back.
school_story_24_screen_7_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Can you take another example?
school_story_24_screen_8_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Okay, guess if the risk is high or low that you will get your money back if you lend it to:
school_story_24_screen_8_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Alien, you know it has money at home. And when you last lent money to Alien, you got it back the next day.
school_story_24_screen_9_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE The correct answer was: Low! Guess if the risk is high or low that you will get your money back if you lend it to:
school_story_24_screen_9_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Toasty, who just bought something expensive for all his money. And Toasty has not returned the money it borrowed from two of your friends last month.
school_story_24_screen_10_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE The correct answer was: High!
school_story_24_screen_10_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE When it comes to saving and investing, risk is important to keep in mind. As in a savings account with that deposit protection, there is very low risk ...
school_story_24_screen_12_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE ...but it also has low growth. You make very little money from the interest rate as you remember.
school_story_24_screen_12_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Risk is what allows you to grow your money more. But it is also the risk that makes you lose your money.
school_story_24_screen_13_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE We're going back to our garden of fruit trees again.
school_story_24_screen_13_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE We say you want to grow bananas in Sweden. If you can do it, you will be richly rewarded because no one else has succeeded in doing so. Now it is popular to buy food grown locally, then you get a huge return!
school_story_24_screen_13_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE I do not like bananas
school_story_24_screen_13_button_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Can you grow money trees?
school_story_24_screen_13_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE I don’t have green fingers
school_story_24_screen_14_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE At the same time it is almost impossible because we do not have the right climate. There is a high risk that things will go badly and you will lose the money you spent on the plants.
school_story_24_screen_14_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Shoot, I just started looking for banana seeds
school_story_24_screen_15_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE There is also a risk that something unpredictable will happen. If there is a storm, all your fruit trees may die.
school_story_24_screen_15_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Whatever, it’s tiresome to water them anyways
school_story_24_screen_16_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE And both in investments in companies, and if you are going to grow fruit trees, you can protect yourself by spreading the risk.
school_story_24_screen_16_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE It means you buy smaller amounts, but of many different varieties. So instead of betting everything on one horse, you spread the risk.
school_story_24_screen_16_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Ah, like a bag of mixed candy!
school_story_24_screen_17_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Let’s say you only have apple trees in your garden. One year there will be a disease, apple plague. Then all your trees will die and you will have lost all the money you put in.
school_story_24_screen_17_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE But if you have both banana trees, plum trees and apple trees instead, then you have all the banana trees and plum trees left after the apple plague.
school_story_24_screen_17_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Noted. Spreading the risk is smart
school_story_24_screen_18_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE When it comes to trading shares, there is an easy way to buy shares in many different companies, and that is to buy mutual funds.
school_story_24_screen_18_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE You then buy shares in an entire fund. They often contain between 20 and 100 different companies!
school_story_24_screen_18_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Good spreading of the risk!
school_story_24_screen_19_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE A fund is like owning an entire garden of fruit trees taken care of by a gardener.
school_story_24_screen_19_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE In fund language, the person who takes care of the fund is called the fund manager. And managing the fund and doing the work for you is a service, and services cost money.
school_story_24_screen_19_button_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Yes you have to pay for services
school_story_24_screen_20_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE The fee you pay is called the annual fee and is usually quite low. But you have to be careful, some fees are much higher. You have to learn a little and look at that too!
school_story_24_screen_20_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE The fee is taken from the profit, ie the money you earn, so it's good if it's low.
school_story_24_screen_20_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Now there's too much information again
school_story_24_screen_20_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE You have to keep an eye on everything!
school_story_24_screen_20_button_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE I always try to keep track
school_story_24_screen_20_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Good that you let me know!
school_story_24_screen_21_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Okay, at least now you know a little bit about how investing in companies works, and what the risk is.

school_story_24_screen_21_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Oh no, hurry! I want blueberry pie later!

school_rocket_6_screen_2_button_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Man har en betalningsanmärkning som man förtjänat
school_rocket_6_screen_2_button_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Det betyder att man har begått ett bedrägeri
school_rocket_6_screen_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Vad kallas det man får på sin kreditupplysning om man inte betalat kravet från kronofogden?
school_rocket_6_screen_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Vad gör ett företag om man är skyldig dem pengar, innan de skickar ärendet till ett inkassoföretag?
school_rocket_6_screen_4_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Skickar en påminnelse och ett krav
school_rocket_6_screen_4_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Skickar två påminnelser och en inbjudan att betala
school_rocket_6_screen_4_button_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Skickar två krav och en bedjan
school_rocket_6_screen_4_button_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Skickar ett krav och två påminnelser
school_rocket_6_screen_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Dessa företag samlar information om ens möjligheter att betala skulder. Det leder till att människor inte kan låna mer än de har råd med. Vad kallas sådana företag?
school_rocket_6_screen_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Du får ett inkassokrav på betalning av en tv, men du har inte köpt någon tv. Vad behöver du göra?
school_rocket_6_screen_6_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Bestrida kravet så fort som möjligt
school_rocket_6_screen_6_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Ignorera kravet, jag har ju inte köpt tvn
school_rocket_6_screen_6_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Kräva bestridning så fort som möjligt
school_rocket_6_screen_6_button_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Betala tvn, så får man en efter betalningen
school_rocket_6_screen_6_button_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Bestrida kravet, men först efter betalningsanmärkningen
school_rocket_6_screen_7_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Vad betyder siffran i riskprognosen egentligen? Vad beskriver den?
school_rocket_6_screen_7_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Hur hög risken är att personen får en betalningsanmärkning inom 1år
school_rocket_6_screen_7_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Hur hög risken är att personen inte betalar nästa faktura
school_rocket_6_screen_7_button_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Hur hög risken är att personen kommer behöva ett lån inom 1år
school_rocket_6_screen_7_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Hur låg risken är att personen har pengar sparade
school_rocket_6_screen_7_button_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Hur låg risken är att personen förlorar en betalningsanmärkning samma år
school_rocket_6_screen_7_button_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Hur hög risken är att de inte kan betala räntorna inom 1 år
school_rocket_6_screen_8_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Alien vill köpa en dator på avbetalning, men får avslag efter kreditupplysningen. Vilken av dessa siffror är det mest troligt Alien har i sin riskprognos?
school_rocket_6_screen_9_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Vad ska man göra för att undvika att ens skuld växer eller att man får långsiktiga följder?
school_rocket_6_screen_9_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Betala sina räkningar eller fakturor i tid, innan förfallodatumet
school_rocket_6_screen_9_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Byter adress om man inte kan betala
school_rocket_6_screen_9_button_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Betala sina räkningar eller fakturor efter förfallodatumet men innan inkasso
school_rocket_6_screen_9_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Betala efter förfallodatum men bestrida påminelseavgifterna
school_rocket_6_screen_9_button_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Betala till kronofogden direkt, då slipper man avgifter
school_rocket_6_screen_9_button_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Låna pengar för att betala, och betala tillbaka det med ett nytt lån
school_rocket_6_screen_10_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Kronofogden har två uppgifter som myndighet vad är de?
school_rocket_6_screen_10_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Hjälpa dem som behöver få in en skuld & stötta dem som ska betala en skuld
school_rocket_6_screen_10_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Låna ut pengar för betalning av skulder & stänga skulder
school_rocket_6_screen_10_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Störa dem som ska betala en skuld & höja skulder med avgifter
school_rocket_6_screen_10_button_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Hjälpa dem som inte vill betala & sänka förseningsavgifter
school_rocket_6_screen_10_button_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Sänka siffrorna på riskprognoser & dela ut betalningsanmärkningar
school_rocket_7_screen_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Savings rate is what you get for saving, but how often is it paid out?
school_rocket_7_screen_1_button_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE When you've inserted and locked them
school_rocket_7_screen_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE From what you learned about saving money at the bank, which option should give the highest interest rate?
school_rocket_7_screen_2_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Locking your money in an account for 5 years
school_rocket_7_screen_2_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Locking your money in an account for 1 year
school_rocket_7_screen_2_button_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Locking your money in an account for 3 years
school_rocket_7_screen_2_button_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Locking your money, but only 1 year at a time
school_rocket_7_screen_2_button_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Not locking your money for the first 3 years
school_rocket_7_screen_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE There is a protection on your money from the Swedish state, what is it called?
school_rocket_7_screen_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE What is investment and what does it do?
school_rocket_7_screen_4_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE To put money into something in the hope that it will give a return
school_rocket_7_screen_4_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE To put money into something in hope  that it will lose value
school_rocket_7_screen_4_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Buying a business, and splitting it up
school_rocket_7_screen_4_button_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Buying a return or profit in a company
school_rocket_7_screen_4_button_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE To win money and bet it
school_rocket_7_screen_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you buy an old toy because you think you can sell it for more money in the future, is it an investment?
school_rocket_7_screen_5_button_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Yes, if you actually gain on it
school_rocket_7_screen_5_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Investment only applies to companies
school_rocket_7_screen_5_button_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE No, because the toy is already old
school_rocket_7_screen_5_button_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Only if the toy is your own
school_rocket_7_screen_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE What kind of business is a company really?
school_rocket_7_screen_6_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Delivering products or services for sale
school_rocket_7_screen_6_button_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE An authority that handles shares for sale
school_rocket_7_screen_7_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE A small part of a company you can buy
school_rocket_7_screen_7_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE A company you can buy
school_rocket_7_screen_7_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE A small portion of returns you can buy
school_rocket_7_screen_7_button_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE A whole return you can buy
school_rocket_7_screen_7_button_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE A small part of a profit you can get
school_rocket_7_screen_8_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE What is the part of the company profit you can get as a shareholder called?
school_rocket_7_screen_9_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Why is there a high risk of buying all the shares in a start-up company you do not know much about?
school_rocket_7_screen_9_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE You lose all your money if the company goes bankrupt
school_rocket_7_screen_9_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE The company sells fewer shares, and then it's harder to make a profit
school_rocket_7_screen_9_button_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE You lose some of your money if the company goes bankrupt
school_rocket_7_screen_9_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Larger companies can take over the profits
school_rocket_7_screen_9_button_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Profit is small compared to large established companies
school_rocket_7_screen_9_button_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE The company can ignore paying dividends
school_rocket_7_screen_10_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you want to reduce your risk of losing all your money in shares, what do you do and what is it called?
school_rocket_7_screen_10_button_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Spreading the risk, you buy shares in many different companies
school_rocket_7_screen_10_button_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Risk maximization, buying shares in a single company
school_rocket_7_screen_10_button_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Spreading the risk, buying shares in a single company
school_rocket_7_screen_10_button_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Maxing the risk, you buy shares in many different companies
school_rocket_7_screen_10_button_5_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Risk reduction, you only buy low-risk stocks in a company
school_rocket_7_screen_10_button_6_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Risk reduction, you buy companies instead of shares

school_general_tutorial_text_1: PLZ_TRANSLATE Welcome to the Superskills Adventure! This is where I teach you real money skills!
school_general_tutorial_text_2: PLZ_TRANSLATE There are many planets here. You will travel between them, and on each planet I will teach you about one financial topic.
school_general_tutorial_text_3: PLZ_TRANSLATE Each planet has destinations, that you will go through with my help. This is how you collect Financial Superskills!
school_general_tutorial_text_4: PLZ_TRANSLATE And hey - whenever you need help: just click on me and I’ll explain. Are you ready?
school_start_earn_xp: PLZ_TRANSLATE Start collecting XP in the Superskills Adventure!
school_earn_more_xp: PLZ_TRANSLATE Collect more XP in the Superskills Adventure!
school_no_more_xp_to_earn: PLZ_TRANSLATE No more XP to collect in the Superskills Adventure!
school_click_to_get_started: PLZ_TRANSLATE Click here to get started
school_beat_your_old_scores: PLZ_TRANSLATE Try to beat your old scores
school_shop_intro_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Welcome to the Gimi store! It’s time to shop.
school_shop_intro_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Here in Superskills Adventure we use a currency called Piggybucks (PB). Currency is another word for money.
school_chapter_disabled_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE This chapter isn’t released yet
school_chapter_disabled_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Good things comes to those who wait. Redo the other chapters while waiting!
school_lesson_disabled_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE This is locked! Come back when you have finished the previous destination.
school_lesson_disabled_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE You’re doing so good, keep up with that!
school_chapter_locked_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE You can't go to this planet yet!
school_chapter_locked_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE You need to help Alien collect enough fuel in the Rocket Launch in a previous chapter first
school_rocket_tutorial_screen_1_title:
PLZ_TRANSLATE Hello again!
Good job on getting through the destinations and meeting up with me here for the Rocket Launch!
school_rocket_tutorial_screen_1_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE For us to be able to go to the next planet, we have to get fuel!
school_rocket_tutorial_screen_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE Here at the station we can get it by answering correctly to some questions about finance.
school_rocket_tutorial_screen_2_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE Can you please help me? You seem to have some financial superskills!
school_rocket_tutorial_screen_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE You will get ten questions. The meter will fill up with one liter per correct answer.
school_rocket_tutorial_screen_3_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE For the rocket to launch we need at least 5 liters of fuel!
school_rocket_tutorial_screen_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE If we can't launch you can go back to Piggy at the destinations and then we try again. And remember, you have a time limit for answering the questions!
school_rocket_tutorial_screen_4_subtitle: PLZ_TRANSLATE I'm ready! Are you ready to try and see if we can launch to the next planet!?
school_story_snippet_1_screen_1_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE You are new here right? I'm Alien. I always wanted to travel the galaxy. I have a rocket but never been able to get any fuel...
school_story_snippet_1_screen_2_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE ...But to get fuel here, you have to have mad financial Superskills and I know nothing about money.
school_story_snippet_1_screen_3_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE I just have to stay here and watch my rocket get dusty. But hey! Maybe we can help each other!
school_story_snippet_1_screen_4_title: PLZ_TRANSLATE If you learn from Piggy, I'll prepare the rocket for travel. Then we can go get fuel together! Deal?
